attributes.additional_details:
This House recognises that politics in the United Kingdom is solely a matter for the British people.

Therefore no political material relating to UK politics or the UK's foreign relations may be imported into the UK. Moreover, no political material may be funded from outside the UK. Every political document distributed or made available, by any means, to the British people must provide details of the amounts and sources of all funding by accounts posted by all available means, e.g. public libraries, council offices, websites. It must be a criminal offence to breach requirement, punishable by a minimum of 5 years imprisonment for every person involved.
